overall_goal: Prepare and apply pastry dough and whipped cream using piping bag and mat, in collaboration with Woman X.

clips.subgoal: Prepare and apply pastry dough using piping bag and mat.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Hold and prepare piping bag for use.
Squeeze and fold the piping bag intermittently to apply pastry on the mat.
Interact with Woman X to pick more pastry and continue application.
Continue squeezing and folding the piping bag to apply pastry on the mat.
Interact with Woman X for more pastry and continue application.
Continue squeezing and folding the piping bag to apply more pastry on the mat.

clips.subgoal: Prepare and apply whipped cream using piping bag and mat.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Put dough on board and use piping paper.
Interact with Woman X to refill piping paper with whipped cream and continue application.
Continue squeezing, rolling, and putting the whipped cream on the mat.

clips.subgoal: Prepare and apply flour on a mat using piping bag.

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Spread flour on mat using piping bag and fold the bag intermittently.
Interact with Woman X to refill the piping bag with more flour.
Continue spreading flour on mat using piping bag.
Interact with Woman X to refill the piping bag with more flour.
